text: James MacDonough (born April 3, 1970) is an American bass guitarist. He has played with heavy metal bands Megadeth, Nevermore, and Iced Earth. == Bands == * Iced Earth: 1996–2000, 2001–2004 * Megadeth: 2004–2006 * Nevermore: 2006 == References == Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:American bass guitarists Category:Megadeth members
title: James MacDonough
